entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Temperature rising to 17 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. A few thunderstorms early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to 17 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
